cause.description:
The United Nations is a bloated bureacratic organization that is more concerned about appeasing Third World dictators than doing what is best for the world.
1. The US should not be a participating member in the United Nations
2. The US should stop payment of all United Nations dues
3. The US should destroy the United Nations building whether they are in session or not
cause.mission: To stop the US government from wasting its time in dealing with the UN
cause.name: Get the US out of the UN
